tool.name: oob_init
tool.description: Initializes a permanent Out-of-Band (OOB) testing environment for the current scan. Returns a base OOB URL. Call this ONCE at the start of a scan if you plan to test for blind vulnerabilities.

tool.name: oob_get_url
tool.description: Generates a unique, trackable OOB URL for a specific payload. The 'identifier' will appear in the OOB logs, allowing you to correlate hits with specific injection points.

parameter.name: identifier
parameter.description: A short label for the payload (e.g., 'ssrf_param_id', 'xxe_entity').

tool.name: oob_poll
tool.description: Checks the OOB server for any DNS or HTTP interactions triggered by your payloads. Returns details of the interaction (Source IP, Time, Type, Path/Subdomain).
